com.emc.vipr.client.core

Class AbstractResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractResources<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of resource.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resources<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBulkResources, AuthnProviders, VirtualDataCenters, Workflows

    public abstract class AbstractResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resources<T>
    Base class for all resource types. This class provides the implementation of many methods that may or may not be implemented by all resources as a convenience (ACLs/Tasks/Quotas). This also provides a basic implementation of Resources.getByIds(Collection, ResourceFilter) that looks up each resource in the collection one by one.
